meaningMnemonic: You hopefully know that this has something to do with <kanji>housesitting</kanji> (留守番). So, a <kanji>telephone</kanji> (電話) that does housesitting for you is what? It's your <vocabulary>answering machine</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>voicemail</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
